channel.title: Runescape-Xperia Development Page
channel.description:
[center][font=comic sans ms][size=36pt][b]Runescape-Xperia[/b][/size][/font][/center]
[b]Information:[/b] Runescape-Xperia is coded and founded by me, I started with the original server and client base that Sanity made. I've made some modifications to the client and the server, I haven't started getting into coding it just making some text neater and better as of the moment with me not having much time. I'm going to start coding and fixing the skills and economy and all the other stuff you would do when you actually code. Runescape-Xperia is owned by me, although I am looking for someone that can help me code so things can get done faster and more efficient. I'm hoping this project goes far and people help me with my issues and all my problems as I not great with java and this project will be also helping me learn more java towards Runescape Private Servers.
[url=http://www.runescapexperia.smfnew.com/][img]http://www.rs2006.net/favicon.ico[/img]Official Forums[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/RunescapeXperia?feature=mhee][img]http://my.ebrainiacs.com/service/themes/html/ebDefault/icons/eb/youtube_favicon.png[/img]YouTube Channel[/url] [email=Runescape_Xperia@hotmail.com][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/email_sm.gif[/img]E-Mail Me[/email]
[b]Key:[/b] Green - Complete. Orange - Started. Red - Not Started.
[b]Server Additions:[/b] Skillcape equipping the the right slots. New home added. Gnome gliders added. 100% Lumbridge Autospawn added. Runescape like shops. 100% Skillcape emotes. Funpk. Wilderness. Non-Glitching NPCS. NPC Clipping. NPC Dialogues. Decent PVM. Decent PVP. Fix special timers. Add minigames.
[b]Client Additions:[/b] Added A new tab on the bottom left for updates and stuff. Added Skillcape button to the emotes list. Add more emotes. Add a couple of new buttons on my equipment tab. Fix the child board in the skills tab.
[i]These are the only things I can think of right now, I need help with adding 100% Skill cape emotes. NPC Clipping, NPC Dialogues, Non-Glitching Npcs. if anyone can offer help can you please E-mail at: Runescape_Xperia@hotmail.com Thank-you, I hope this comes far and I can get help and make this a decent server.[/i]

Oh okay, Well I’ve private messaged Mopman and asked him to check them out.

item.title: Runescape-Xperia Development Page
item.dc:creator: @Racist_Turtle Racist Turtle
item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

[quote=“Runescape-Xperia, post:3, topic:410210”][quote author=pk2play link=topic=511496.msg3711795#msg3711795 date=1313389348]
You gotta get your link confirmed by a mod
[/quote]
Hover over them, why would I want a development that I want to succeed to be a virus? Staff, please confirm these links so people know they aren’t viruses. Thanks![/quote]

It’s not that we are afraid of it being viruses. It’s just forum rules that you need to have your links confirmed by mods.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape-Xperia Development Page

item.description:
@Runescape-Xperia wrote:

[center][font=comic sans ms][size=36pt]Runescape-Xperia[/size][/font][/center]

Information:
Runescape-Xperia is coded and founded by me, I started with the original server and client base that Sanity made. I’ve made some modifications to the client and the server, I haven’t started getting into coding it just making some text neater and better as of the moment with me not having much time. I’m going to start coding and fixing the skills and economy and all the other stuff you would do when you actually code. Runescape-Xperia is owned by me, although I am looking for someone that can help me code so things can get done faster and more efficient. I’m hoping this project goes far and people help me with my issues and all my problems as I not great with java and this project will be also helping me learn more java towards Runescape Private Servers.

Official Forums
YouTube Channel
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/email_sm.gif[/img]E-Mail Me

Key:
Green - Complete.
Orange - Started.
Red - Not Started.

Server Additions:
Skillcape equipping the the right slots.
New home added.
Gnome gliders added.
100% Lumbridge Autospawn added.
Runescape like shops.
100% Skillcape emotes.
Funpk.
Wilderness.
Non-Glitching NPCS.
NPC Clipping.
NPC Dialogues.
Decent PVM.
Decent PVP.
Fix special timers.
Add minigames.

Client Additions:
Added A new tab on the bottom left for updates and stuff.
Added Skillcape button to the emotes list.
Add more emotes.
Add a couple of new buttons on my equipment tab.
Fix the child board in the skills tab.

These are the only things I can think of right now, I need help with adding 100% Skill cape emotes. NPC Clipping, NPC Dialogues, Non-Glitching Npcs. if anyone can offer help can you please E-mail at: Runescape_Xperia@hotmail.com Thank-you, I hope this comes far and I can get help and make this a decent server.
